message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.event.block.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.event.player.*.
Abbreviation in name 'onTNTExplode' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'onTNTInteract' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'||' should be on a new line.
Abbreviation in name 'onNPCClick' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
